root: ^Hello, is anyone reading this? If anyone survived please reply immediately!

c-0: ^There was a crash, you don't remember? I'm part of the organization that sent you there to check out the signals we were recieving there.

s: ^I don't understand much, but what should I be doing?

c-0: ^For now, you need to get situated, we won't be able to reach you until a couple days so try to survive there for as long as possible until we arrive.

s: ^I have no idea how I should start out

c-0: ^Try to find some resources around the area that could help you... Maybe you can use them to make some stuff to help you out
